title: Museo at Sonsbeek 2008
content:
At the [10th Sonsbeek International Sculpture Exhibition](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743/http:/www.sonsbeek2008.nl/read/en/home) (sonsbeek 2008: grandeur) [Ana Maria Tavares](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743/http:/www.sonsbeek2008.nl/read/en/exhibition/artists/tavares) used Museo for her work "Five Secrets of the Waters (For Mnemosyne)". There are five stones in Sonsbeek, each at a junction of an underground stream.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s1_3506.jpg)

Museo is also used for a little booklet/folder.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s2_5093.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s3_4276.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730031743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s4_3722.jpg)
author: Jos Buivenga
